attributes.action: Require government funded research into climate change to meet minimum standards of honesty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to ensure that public policy is guided by the best possible scientific knowledge, it should be required of research bodies such as the Hadley Centre that their published research meet at least the same standards of disclosure and transparency as financial and mining prospectuses, such that failure to meet such standards should disqualify research from consideration in setting public policy.
